summary: "Atlantis: The Lost Empire" is a 2001 Disney animated adventure movie set in 1914. It follows Milo Thatch, a young linguist who finds a sacred book and believes it will lead him to the lost city of Atlantis. With a crew of mercenaries, he sets out on a journey. The film combines hand-drawn animation with computer-generated imagery (CGI) and features a language created by a linguist. Despite mixed reviews and a weak box office performance due to competition from other films, it has since gained a cult following. A direct-to-video sequel was released in 2003.
title: Atlantis The Lost Empire
